original_text: For we are about to destroy this place, because the outcry against its people has become great before the Lord, and the Lord has sent us to destroy it.”
korean_text: 그들에 대한 부르짖음이 여호와 앞에 크므로 여호와께서 이 곳을 멸하시려고 우리를 보내셨나니 우리가 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: For we are about to destroy this place
because the outcry against its people
has become great before the Lord
and the Lord has sent us to destroy it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 우리를 보내어 그것을 파괴하게 하셨습니다.
